definition: sinology/Chinese studies (in foreign schools)/Han Learning, a Qing dynasty movement aiming at a philological appraisal of the Classics
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)

sentences.english: The Harvard-Yenching Library founded by him has become a treasure house for Chinese studies.
sentences.chinese: 他创建的哈佛燕京图书馆，成为西方汉学研究的宝库。

sentences.english: This book is one of the most important ones in the research of Confucius Analects by the Qing sinologists.
sentences.chinese: 《论语考异》是清代汉学家研究《论语》的扛鼎之作。

sentences.english: Many directors of the Confucius Institutes are also Sinologists.
sentences.chinese: 许多孔子学院的院长就是汉学家。

sentences.english: In the field of study on poetry during the Song Dynasty, Japanese Sinologists have achieved attracting results.
sentences.chinese: 日本汉学界在宋诗研究领域曾取得令人瞩目的成果。
其他书名传教士汉学硏究。

sentences.english: Under his initiative, Soviet Sinology swept the West for a time.
sentences.chinese: 在他的开创下，苏联汉学研究成绩一度睥睨西欧。

sentences.english: English translation: The term "Sinology" carries a slight overtone of disrespect towards China.
sentences.chinese: 汉学的名称对中国有一点不尊敬的意味。

sentences.english: Yang Yuanhong to direct the poetry. and sinologist Bunn TON.
sentences.chinese: 与汉学家霍布恩先生切磋。

sentences.english: Malmqvist is the sole sinologist among the eighteen members of the Swedish Academy .
sentences.chinese: 马悦然是瑞典皇家学院十八位院士中唯一的汉学家。

sentences.english: The scholarship of Han and Song were both important schools in the traditional Confucian scholarship.
sentences.chinese: 汉学与宋学皆为传统儒学的重要派别。

sentences.english: By James Legge has been pay more attention as a pioneer of Chinese Studies in the West.
sentences.chinese: 以理雅各为先驱的西方汉学研究又被重视起来。

sentences.english: Chur This enables us to see where he died the tendency of Western scholars of Sinology.
sentences.chinese: 库尔本使我们看到了不治汉学的欧美学者的倾向。

sentences.english: As a sinologist, Stephen Owen is famous for his works on classical Chinese literature.
sentences.chinese: 宇文所安是以中国古典文学研究而闻名的汉学家。

sentences.english: Professor Barrett's overview of British sinology has surprised many people.
sentences.chinese: 巴若教授为英国汉学溯往，所得的结果令人震惊。

sentences.english: The thesis penetrates into the translation principles and the translations of the three British sinologists.
sentences.chinese: 本文重点探讨三位英国汉学家的译学与译作。

sentences.english: Britain seemed excluded from this European Sinology circle.
sentences.chinese: 英国似乎被排除在欧洲汉学圈之外。

definition: Western learning (intellectual movement in the late Qing)/also called 洋務運動|洋务运动
old learning/Chinese traditional teaching as opposed to material from the West
to interpret and make glossaries and commentaries on classic texts
study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries
Former Han dynasty school of Confucian scholars
